name: tdv-react
description: React library that allows form validation manipulation through TypeScript Decorators

scripts.deploy:minor: npm cache clean --force && npm i --force && npm version minor --force && npm run build && npm publish --access=public && git add . && git commit -m 'bump react minor version' && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm cache clean --force && npm i --force && npm version major --force && npm run build && npm publish --access=public && git add . && git commit -m 'bump react major version' && git push
scripts.deploy:patch: npm cache clean --force && npm i --force && npm version patch --force && npm run build && npm publish --access=public && git add . && git commit -m 'bump react patch version' && git push
